title: I don't know if this is a bug but...
body: I was downloading League, watching the progress bar crawl to the top. It made it to the end, but the numbers at the bottom kept going. It went all the way to 1640.3 out of 1504.9 before sending me to the home screen. What is this?

replies.body: I've seen that happen a few times when my connection goes dormant or my network hiccups and I lose my connection to the patching servers. Most the time it should stop downloading, but sometimes the patcher doesn't realize and keeps going, basically a weird visual bug. Try restarting the patch if you having as admin, and maybe with a hard-wired connection just in case it happens again.
